text:
Jimmy Boyd (January 9, 1939 – March 7, 2009) was an American musician and actor. He became known for his performance and recording of "I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus".
He was born James Boyd in McComb, Mississippi. He died from cancer, age seventy, in Santa Monica, California.

annotations.surface_form: I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus
